badges.name: Ethereum Year Badge
badges.description: Check out the Ethereum Year Badge! It's like a digital trophy that shows off the year your wallet made its debut on Ethereum. It's a little present from Scroll to celebrate all the cool stuff you've done in the Ethereum ecosystem.

badges.name: Scroll Origins NFT
badges.description:
[Scroll Origins](https://scroll.io/blog/scroll-origins-nft) is a [specially designed NFT](https://scroll.io/blog/designing-scroll-origins)
program to celebrate alongside early developers building on Scroll within 60 days of Genesis Block (Before December 9, 2023 10:59PM GMT)

badges.name: Scroll Reputation Attestation
badges.description: Trusta MEDIA Score on Scroll Network ranging from 20 to 100 is eligible for minting a Reputation Attestation Badge on Scroll. Craft this badge to affirm your status as an engaged participant in the realm of Scroll!

badges.name: Ambient Swapooor
badges.description: Swapooor badge is for users who have made one or more single swaps on Ambient for $500. (Art by @ShizzyAizawa)

badges.name: ZNS Badge
badges.description: Earn this badge for minting a ZNS Domain on Scroll

badges.name: Pencils SOUL Drops
badges.description: The Pencils SOUL Drops program is linked to users’ verified social identities. Holders earn Pencil Points and rewards from Scroll’s ecosystem partners.

badges.name: Unrevealed
badges.description: Unrevealed scrolly badge.

badges.name: OmniHub Badge
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who created a minimum one NFT collection through OmniHub to Scroll network.

badges.name: Proof of Humanity Badge
badges.description: Demonstrate your human agency exclusively through your blockchain activities, without the necessity for validation from a centralized entity. The issuance of this badge serves as a testament to your authenticity as a human participant within the Scroll ecosystem.

badges.name: Ambient Providoor
badges.description: Providoor badge is for users who have made one or more single LP positions on Ambient Finance valued over $1000. (Art by @ShizzyAizawa)

badges.name: Unique Humanity Score
badges.description: This badge is for Scrollers who have a Passport score above 20, and have minted an onchain attestation to the Scroll network. Minting this badge informs everyone in the Scroll ecosystem that you're a real human!

badges.name: Scroll Cross-chain Professional
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who bridged a minimum of $100 through Symbiosis to Scroll

badges.name: XHS Holder
badges.description: This badge is for holders with an XHS (Adaptive Humanity Score) above 0. Prove your humanity at https://xname.app/xhs .

badges.name: Entry Scroll Bridger Badge
badges.description: Owltors who complete one bridge to Scroll Network via Owlto Finance can claim the Badge.

badges.name: Scrolling bridge 6
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who made cross-chain swap from zkSync to Scroll.

badges.name: Symbiosis Pro Swapper
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who made a minimum of $100 on-chain swap on Scroll (E.g. wrsETH to weETH)

badges.name: Scrolling bridge 1
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who made cross-chain swap from Blast to Scroll.

badges.name: Zebra
badges.description: Users who participate in Scroll Canvas and complete tasks will receive Zebra's 'zebra' badge. Users with this badge will enjoy Zebra's early benefits in the future.

badges.name: NFTs2Me Creator Badge
badges.description: Badge awarded for creating at least one NFT Collection on Scroll using https://NFTs2Me.com

badges.name: Smilecobra Genesis Badge
badges.description: Users who complete quest on the SmileCobra platform and mint the SMC HONOUR NFT will receive the SmileCobra Genesis Badge. Holders of this badge will enjoy potential airdrop incentives across the entire platform in the future.

badges.name: Scroll Booster
badges.description: This badge is for holders with .scroll names. Secure your .scroll identity at https://xname.app .

badges.name: Toaster Airdrop Badge
badges.description: Connect your X (Twitter) account on our website and follow @toasterfinance to receive this badge. You can link your Twitter account here: https://www.toaster.finance/butter. (Art by @yeju_jeong_)

badges.name: Loyal Scroll Bridger Badge
badges.description: Owltors who complete three bridges to Scroll Network via Owlto Finance can claim the Badge.

badges.name: Ambient Filloor
badges.description: Filloor badge is for users who have one or more filled limit orders on Ambient Finance valued over $500. (Art by @ShizzyAizawa)

badges.name: Pencil P Badge
badges.description: Pencils P Badge is rewarded to users who actively participated in Pencils Protocol multi-seasons campaign, with staking more than 0.1 ETH equivalent assets into Scroll ecosystem

badges.name: SyncSwap Lucky Trader
badges.description: This badge is rewarded to early SyncSwap users on Scroll who have made one or more swaps for more than $450.

badges.name: Scroll RetroBridger
badges.description: RetroBridger Badge on Scroll L2 dedicated for everyone who bridged from 0.05 ETH or $150 worth of stables through RetroBridge to Scroll Network

badges.name: Fanaticism Scroll Bridger Badge
badges.description: Owltors who complete five bridges to Scroll Network via Owlto Finance can claim the Badge.

badges.name: Scroll Explorer
badges.description: Own at least 1 piece of land on Scroll, either through purchase or adventure reward.

badges.name: RubyScore ranking on Scroll
badges.description: Increase your on-chain Scroll ranking by collecting NFT boxes on RubyScore and earn a Scroll Canvas badge

badges.name: Hippo Badge
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who have swapped a minimum of $50 on HippoSwap.

badges.name: Nuri Locker Badge (10)
badges.description: This badge represents ownership of a veNURI lock with at least 10 NURI and a locktime above 3 years

badges.name: Scroller Agent Badge
badges.description: Earn this badge by bridging with your Scroller NFT from ETH Mainnet to Scroll.

badges.name: Eisen Beginner
badges.description: This badge is awarded to users who have completed a swap of more than $10 in value on Scroll via Eisen. Start your journey on Eisen with this beginner-level badge and showcase your first step into the world of decentralized finance.

badges.name: NFTs2Me Supporter Badge
badges.description: This badge is awarded as owner of NFTs2Me Supporter Pins. Mint yours at https://nfts2me.com/scroll-badges/

badges.name: OmniHub Guardian Badge
badges.description: This badge is awarded to users who own the OmniHub Guardian NFT collection on the Scroll network.

badges.name: Conft 2024 Badge
badges.description: Conft 2024 Badge is for users with a unique ‘.s’ domain name registered on Scroll via Conft’s Name Service. Users with this badge secure eligibility for future rewards from Conft.

badges.name: Smilecobra Genleap badge
badges.description: Genleap is the first AAA MMORPG game developed by Smilecobra Studio. Users who complete tasks on Smilecobra and mint SMC HALO NFT will receive the Smilecobra Genleap badge. Holders of this badge will be eligible for potential airdrop rewards from the SMC

badges.name: Toaster GM Badge
badges.description: GM from Toaster! Users who deposit or swap on Scroll more than $300 will receive this badge.

badges.name: Pencil S Badge
badges.description: Pencils S Badge is rewarded to users who actively participated in Pencils Protocol multi-seasons campaign, with staking more than 0.5 ETH equivalent assets into Scroll ecosystem

badges.name: MiniBridge Beginner
badges.description: MiniBridge Bronze badge is for users who have made 1 bridge transaction to scroll on MiniBridge.

badges.name: Human Squad with DMAIL
badges.description: This badge celebrates the collaboration with DMAIL on the Scroll network. To qualify, you need to complete two tasks: 1. Hold a .scroll name at https://scroll.xname.app ; 2. Send an email on the Scroll network using https://mail.dmail.ai/compose .

badges.name: SyncSwap Stargazer
badges.description: This badge is rewarded to early SyncSwap users on Scroll who have one or more liquidity position over $1000.

badges.name: Scroll on Highlight Commemorative Mint Badge
badges.description: This badge is for Scroll collectors who mint the Scroll on Highlight commemorative mint. Different tiers are awarded based on how many iterations are minted in each mint transaction.

badges.name: Conft Scroll Box
badges.description: Conft Scroll Box Badge is for the users that minted special “Cosmic Surprise” collection on Scroll. Users with this badge secure eligibility for future rewards from Conft.

badges.name: Eisen Explorer
badges.description: Earn this badge by completing a swap of more than $500 in value on Scroll via Eisen. The Explorer Badge signifies your growing experience and commitment to navigating the Eisen ecosystem.

badges.name: Explorer Certificate
badges.description: This certificate is designed for people who have sent Bunny to Chain explore on Scroll at least once.

badges.name: Scroll Domain Master Badge 🎖️
badges.description: Achieve the Scroll Domain Master Badge by minting 5 domains on Scroll. This prestigious badge marks you as a master in the domain space! Mint your domains now: https://zns.bio/

badges.name: Venister Badge
badges.description: Own aa champion in the Venverse.

badges.name: Landing on Scroll
badges.description: Transfer 1 Bunny NFT to Scroll via Cross-chain Adventure.

badges.name: OmniHub Gold Badge
badges.description: This badge is awarded to users who have created five NFT collections through OmniHub on the Scroll network.

badges.name: Swapping Sorcerer
badges.description: I swapped more than $500 on Scribe DEX (and earned points in the process). Now watch me conjure fire 🔥

badges.name: Hippo Realm Holder
badges.description: This badge is designed for users holding Hippo Realm NFTs on Scroll.

badges.name: Toaster OG Badge
badges.description: Congratulations, you've achieved OG status on Toaster! This badge is awarded for collecting 300 Butters. Holders of this badge may enjoy exclusive benefits in the future.

badges.name: MiniBridge Silver
badges.description: MiniBridge Silver badge is for users who have made 5 bridge transactions to scroll on MiniBridge.

badges.name: Senior Scroll Explorer
badges.description: Own at least 1 piece of Tier 2 land on Scroll, either through purchase or adventure reward.

badges.name: Liquidity Loremaster
badges.description: By cultivating the arcane practices of DeFi I provided more than $1,000 of liquidity on Scribe DEX (and earned points in the process). Now watch me conjure lightning ⚡️

badges.name: Nuri Locker Badge (100)
badges.description: This badge represents ownership of a veNURI lock with more than 100 NURI and a locktime above 3 years

badges.name: VenisterX Badge
badges.description: Own 5 champions in the Venverse.

badges.name: Grade POP Badge
badges.description: The purpose of this badge is to recognize the Grade POP contributors

badges.name: Ambient Yeet
badges.description: Yeet badge is for users who are providing a sizable amount of liquidity in a single position. You will be rewarded accordingly to the size, but for now, enjoy having a differently colored croc! (Art by @ShizzyAizawa)

badges.name: Hippo Badge
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who have swapped a minimum of $100 on HippoSwap

badges.name: Scroll Overlord
badges.description: Participated in at least one Land War season on scroll.

badges.name: GNFT Whale
badges.description: The purpose of this badge is to recognize the GNFT Whale

badges.name: Bronze Scroll Bridger
badges.description: Pilots who complete one bridge to Scroll Network via Orbiter Finance can claim the Badge. This badge is upgradable based on your number of bridges.

badges.name: Diamond Scroll Bridger Badge
badges.description: Pilots who become Top 100 in Scroll Trading Frenzy can claim the Badge
